name: Falling Blocks (itch) (Raidasaurus)
description:
Falling Blocks is the first 'complete' game I've developed.

I decided to try my hand at a Ludum Dare-esque game in which i gave myself 48 hours to design and develope a game during the time.

This was the first time I attempted to finish a game rather than just move on once I had completed a prototype of a single or few base/core mechanics.

Instructions:

  • Avoid gray objects
  • Collect gold coins
  • Survive!

Controls:

  • A / D or Left arrow / Right arrow to move
  • Buttons at bottom can be used instead
